metadata.name: Microsoft 365 - User Restricted from Sending Email
metadata.comment: Detects when a Security Compliance Center reported a user who exceeded sending limits of the service policies and because of this has been restricted from sending email.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('securitycompliancecenter') AND lower(metadata.event_code) = lower('user restricted from sending email') AND lower(actor.authorizations.decision) = lower('success'))

output.summary: Detects when a Security Compliance Center reported a user who exceeded sending limits of the service policies and because of this has been restricted from sending email.
